credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Maira Kalman:  Sayonara, Mrs. Kacklemen
description:
Lulu and her younger brother, Alexander, take an imaginary trip to Japan, thus enabling Lulu to avoid her piano lesson and teacher, Mrs. Kackleman. Lulu narrates the story in a stream-of-consciousness style, supported by colorful and kinetic illustrations.
Reference: New York Public Library LEO catalog (nypl.org) - Copyright 1989 Cahners Business Information, Inc.
name: Book
